reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 500/00: REPEAL OF SUBSECTION 1 (2) OF THE ACT
reg_info.reg_name_text: REPEAL OF SUBSECTION 1 (2) OF THE ACT

content.content: 1. September 1, 2000 is the date prescribed under subsection 1 (3) of the Act as the date on which subsection 1 (2) of the Act is repealed. O. Reg. 500/00, s. 1. Français
content.raw_html:
1. September 1, 2000 is the date prescribed under subsection 1 (3) of the Act as the date on which subsection 1 (2) of the Act is repealed. O. Reg. 500/00, s. 1.

Français
